00008 #ifndef BOOST_TT_DETAIL_ICE_EQ_HPP_INCLUDED
00009 #define BOOST_TT_DETAIL_ICE_EQ_HPP_INCLUDED
00010 
00011 #include "boost/config.hpp"
00012 
00013 namespace boost {
00014 namespace type_traits {
00015 
00016 template <int b1, int b2>
00017 struct ice_eq
00018 {
00019     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = (b1 == b2));
00020 };
00021 
00022 template <int b1, int b2>
00023 struct ice_ne
00024 {
00025     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = (b1 != b2));
00026 };
00027 
00028 #ifndef BOOST_NO_INCLASS_MEMBER_INITIALIZATION
00029 template <int b1, int b2> bool const ice_eq<b1,b2>::value;
00030 template <int b1, int b2> bool const ice_ne<b1,b2>::value;
00031 #endif

00033 } // namespace type_traits
00034 } // namespace boost
